column4: Mbrɛ wo ntamadan dua yɛ fɛw a!"
ɔtɔ bitsi mpo wɔ EWURADZE adampan no ntsi; M'akoma na mo honam dzi ehurusi ma tseasefo Nyankopɔn."
Na akyemfowa enya berɛbuw ama noho
column5: mbrɛ ɔbɔtow ne mba egu mu

column2: "Esiarfo nye hɔn a wɔtse wo fi mu: Wɔbɔkɔ do eyi wo ayɛw."
"Osiarfo nye nyimpa a n'ahoɔdzen wɔ wo mu; Zion atsempɔn no wɔ n'akoma mu."
"Wotwa mu wɔ Nyinsu bɔnsa no mu a wɔdan no bea a mbasu wɔ; Nyew
"Wɔnantsew fi ahoɔdzen mu kɔ ahoɔdzen mu
column3: Hɔn nyinara bopue Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ Zion."

column4: Na hwɛ nyia asera no no enyim."

column2: "Na wo fie dakordzi ye sen apem wɔ ananabea. Mepɛ dɛ meyɛ me Nyankopɔn fi abowano ɔweɔmfo; Sen dɛ mebɛtsena ndzebɔnyɛfo asesee mu."
"Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn yɛ ewia na kyɛm: EWURADZE bɛma adom na enyimnyam: Ɔremmfa adze pa biara nnkam hɔn a wɔnantsew tɔɔtsen."

column4: Osiarfo nye nyimpa a ɔtwer wo."
